name: Techno Brain BPO / (ITES) Limited
description:
Techno Brain BPO / (ITES), is an ISO 9001:2008 certified business process outsourcing and IT-enabled services division of the Techno Brain Group -Africa’s leading ICT solutions and education and training provider.
Techno Brain BPO / ITES offers specially tailored, affordable, quality and high-end solutions in the areas of call centre management, back office services, knowledge process management, digital media services and shared services utilising the latest technology and state-of-the art infrastructure to clients across the globe. Partner with Africa’s BPO leaders Strategic Partner As one of the fastest growing BPO firms in Africa, we have partnered with several Government ministries, NGOs, ISP & telecom providers, HR firms and financial organisations operating in the US, Canada, India and Kenya, to provide world class services to our clients. Tailored, Affordable,Quality Services We offer customised, affordable, and high-end services utilising the latest technology and state-of-the-art infrastructure to clients across the globe. Market Experience With a combined industry experience of 15 years, strong domain knowledge and a huge pool of professionals, Techno Brain BPO / ITES provides clients with strategic insights, and a wide range of scalable offerings to ensure high return on investment.
